name: places/ChIJiZlBXqZYwokRohcBIfqKS94
formattedAddress: 176 E 97th St, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 176 E 97th St, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Had a paid and confirmed Reservation through Spot Hero. Most rude and unprofessional experience I have ever had. Arrived a little after 7 today and after driving all the way in the attendant starting waving his hands they were full even after explaining I had a paid reservation. Had to reverse navigate my way out of the packed garage with no assistance from the attendant whom vanished into the facility somewhere. Caused me to almost miss a procedure at Mt Sinai. had to re book at another nearby garage. This garage should be removed from any affiliations with Spot Hero or other groups. Spot hero stepped up to the plate after I called and made it right. Avoid this garage at all costs.

originalText.text: Parked monthly here for a year, always had great service. The guys who work here are friendly and when I call ahead my car is either out and waiting for me or they pull it up within three minutes. Also helped me out when I had a flat (unrelated to the garage). Monthly rates comparable to local places. Would recommend this garage

originalText.text: I want to love this garage but oh my gosh are they unprofessional. We pay for monthly service and we call way in advance to have our car….I’d say 10% chance it’s waiting for us on time. Unfortunately, the ipark team doesn’t speak to each other between shifts and we are always waiting 10-15 mins for our car this time as I write the review it’s been almost 30 mins…I feel bad for the guy right now bc it’s not exactly his fault so if management is reading PLEASE set up a more efficient process for your team to discuss and share information in between shifts. Such terrible service.

originalText.text: Usually very poorly organized. Employees speak to you like they are doing you a favor rather than treat you like a paying customer. It seems last night they had accepted too many cars and it was a 90+ minute wait to get cars out. It was inexplicable even by NY garage standards. Don't accept so many cars that you can get them out again.

originalText.text: Absolutely worst service I have ever seen in this area with parking garages. Made me wait over 30 minutes to receive my car. Staff continuously yelled at me for being wrong about when I would need my car returned - I had an unexpected emergency and needed my car earlier.  Terrible attitude towards me and told me that I never needed to come back.
